Item.Value: Hi! I'm $0$, it's good to see a new face around here!
Hey there, $^$,hope you're feeling well today!
Hey, $^$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.
Oh, hello $^$, What can I do for you? [Talk:Talk|Construct Buildings:BuyBuildings|Hire Wizards:BuyWorkers]
